H0.text: In the Bible who was David's father. Abraham

H1.text: In the Bible who was David's father. Isaac

H2.text: In the Bible who was David's father. Jacob

H3.text: In the Bible who was David's father. Jesse

A4.text: Jesse ( JESS-ee) or Yishai is a figure described in the Hebrew Bible as the father of David, who became the king of the Israelites.

A5.text: David is sometimes called simply 'Son of Jesse' (Ben Yishai).
